definitions.text: sharp curved horny process on the toe of a bird or some mammals or reptiles
a mechanical device that is curved or bent to suspend or hold or pull something
a grasping structure on the limb of a crustacean or other arthropods
move as if by clawing, seizing, or digging
examples: They clawed their way to the top of the mountain

definitions.text: scratch, scrape, pull, or dig with claws or nails
